description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Tower Defense at its finest! Protect your base by placing turrets and destroy incoming enemy forces! Use your resources wisely to achieve victory! Includes 8 different turret types, such as the antitank cannon, the gatling or the radar. Red Invasion: Tower Defense is an indie game brought to you by Milkstone Studios.
